headings.usage: Page titles, Section headers, KPI values

mono.usage: Order IDs, SKU codes, timestamps, financial data

rules: Use 'Zinc' scale for neutrals (slate-like but cleaner).
Never use pure black (#000000). Use #18181b or #09090b.
Role-specific accents should be used sparingly (e.g., badges, active tab indicators).
High contrast text for readability (WCAG AA compliance).

grids.card_grid: grid grid-cols-1 sm:grid-cols-2 lg:grid-cols-3 xl:grid-cols-4 gap-6

cards.style: bg-white border border-zinc-200 shadow-sm hover:shadow-md transition-shadow duration-200

inputs.style: bg-white border-zinc-200 focus:ring-2 focus:ring-zinc-950 focus:border-transparent rounded-md h-10

badges.style: rounded-full px-2.5 py-0.5 text-xs font-semibold tracking-wide uppercase

visual_enhancers.gradients: None for backgrounds. Use subtle mesh gradients only for empty states or 'hero' moments.

login_bg.usage: Login page background with dark overlay

showroom_placeholder.usage: Dashboard widget background or empty state

icons.style: Stroke width 1.5px or 2px. Consistent sizing (w-4 h-4 for small, w-5 h-5 for medium).

accessibility.contrast: Ensure text meets WCAG AA (4.5:1). Use Zinc-600 or darker for body text on white.
accessibility.focus_states: Visible focus rings (ring-2 ring-offset-2) on all interactive elements.
accessibility.aria: Use aria-labels for icon-only buttons. Ensure semantic HTML (main, section, nav).

instructions_to_main_agent: Implement a 'Control Room' grid layout for the main dashboard.
Use the defined color palette strictly. Do not introduce new colors without reason.
Ensure all interactive elements have hover states defined in the 'components' section.
Use 'Manrope' for all headings to give a distinct modern feel.
For the 'Order List', use a dense table layout with 'JetBrains Mono' for IDs and Dates.
Implement role-based view logic: Showroom sees 'Grid View' by default, Corporate sees 'List View'.
Use the 'login_bg' image for the authentication screen with a heavy blur or overlay to ensure text readability.
Add 'data-testid' to all key interactive elements (buttons, inputs, rows).
universal_guidelines: Avoid 'AI slop' - generic centered layouts. Use asymmetry and whitespace.
No gradients for main backgrounds. Use solid colors or subtle textures.
Micro-animations are mandatory for all interactions.
Prioritize 'Shadcn UI' components but customize them to match the 'Swiss Utility' aesthetic.
